document_data.name: Hills of Scent
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hills of Scent''' was a large grouping of sandy stone hills found in [[the Sword]] region of [[Anauroch]].

Geography.Geographical Features: There were believed to be a number of underground springs located beneath the Hills of Scent.
Geography.Flora & Fauna:
The region likely drew its name from the many [[frankincense]] trees that grew atop the crests of its hills. 

[[Lion]]s were commonly found prowling across the peaks and troughs of the region.

document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Elah'zad]], a secluded oasis that was considered a holy place by the [[Bedine]] people.
* [[Well of the Cloven Rock]], a large and well-known oasis that was home to prides of prowling [[lion]]s.
document_data.Inhabitants: Some tribes of the [[Bedine]] were known to travel through and make use of the resources found throughout the Hills of Scent.
